descriptionHtml:
This mod adds five sisters who are each masters of Destruction, Alteration, Conjuration, Illusion, and Restoration. You can find all five sisters in the College of Winterhold in the Hall of Elements. Due to what each sister uses in magic, some sisters will fight hand to hand while the others stand back and cast magic. They are all marriageable. Is compatible with CBBE and UNPB. Be sure to leave images of the sisters if you want, would love to see them. If you wish to have all sisters join you use Simple Multiple Follower mod by Kuertee at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31581/?

Kali Catherine - Destruction
Jenna Catherine - Alteration
Maya Catherine - Illusion
Haley Catherine - Conjuration
Araminta Catherine - Restoration

Recommended: UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?

Added: Not much really, just changed the race from Brenton to Nord, gave all the sisters a dagger, and changed a few hair colors.

Install: Use NMM or drag files in Data folder.

Known issues: I haven't seen any yet.

Credit: ApachiSkyHair
author: Wolfknight777
